kw.name: Create Session
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=mysession, url=https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=True, debug=0
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server

kw.name: GET On Session
kw.msg: GET Request : url=https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/todos/1 path_url=/todos/1 headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.32.3', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive'} body=None
kw.doc: Sends a GET request on a previously created HTTP Session.
